text: “ Orange Is the New Black ” actress Jamie Denbo has taken to Twitter to call out sexism in Hollywood. “ I was just informed that at the age of 43, I am TOO OLD to play the wife of a 57 year old, ” Denbo, who plays a Jewish inmate at Litchfield Penitentiary named Ginsberg on the Netflix series, wrote in a series of tweets. “ The real wife of the 57 year - old actor is EASILY AT LEAST 50. But this fucker wants to be tv married to a 38 year - old - TOPS. ” Though she declined to reveal the identity of the male actor or to specify which project she was talking about, she did note that the two characters have an 18 - year - old daughter in the script
